description: Periodic derivative of n in base 3.
references: Simmons, G. J. The structure of the differentiation digraphs of binary sequences. Ars Combin. 35 (1993), A, 71-88. Math. Rev. 95f:05052.
formula: If n=b_k b_{k-1} ... b_0 in base 3, a(n) is number with ternary expansion (b_k+b_{k-1}) (b_{k-1}+b_{k-2}) ... (b_1+b_0) (b_0+b_{k}).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Naohiro Nomoto_, Apr 08 2001
